name: Ski Race Extreme
description: Join us for an adrenaline-packed day as top athletes race down the challenging slopes of Whistler Blackcomb in this high-stakes, fast-paced competition! Whether you're cheering from the sidelines or racing for the finish line, the Ski Race Extravaganza promises heart-stopping moments and intense action.
alt: Skiier speeding by with a bloom of snow trailing behind

name: Snowboard Blitz Battle
description: Get ready for the ultimate snowboarding showdown! The Snowboard Blitz Battle is where the best riders go head-to-head, unleashing epic tricks and insane freestyle moves. Watch the action unfold as athletes battle for glory on the slopes—this is where champions are made, and it’s a must-see for anyone who lives for the thrill of snowboarding!
alt: Snowboarder in flight as he is moving down a snowy slope

name: Music Concert Series
description: Feel the beat at the Music Concert Series! With electrifying performances from top bands and DJs, this series brings the perfect soundtrack to your festival experience. Whether you’re catching some live music after a day on the mountain or dancing under the stars, the energy is contagious and the vibes are unmissable!
alt: Crowds looking at a performance on stage

name: 72-hr Film Frenzy
description: Lights, camera, action! The 72-Hour Film Frenzy is an intense, high-speed film competition where filmmakers race against the clock to create jaw-dropping snowboarding and skiing films. With just 72 hours to capture the action, the results are pure adrenaline. Don’t miss the final screening, where these rapid-fire creations come to life in an epic cinematic showcase!
alt: Red empty chairs facing a theatre that is playing a movie
